name: PwC's Accelerator
tag_list: accelerator, start-up, luxembourg, europe, ecosystem, venture-capital, pwc, plugandplay
overview:
Our vision: Assist fast growing companies with solid market traction to accelerate rapily and become global leaders through PwC’s worldide network and extensive competences.

Description: PwC’s Accelerator is a unique initiative in Europe and within the PwC Network. It strives to answer a resounding call within the European community of fast growing small and medium-sized Enterprises (SME’s) in getting help and guidance in becoming global in an ever more single worldwide market.

PwC’s Accelerator answers that need of fast growing European companies to become global by providing:

  • Access to global value-add Equity Capital,
  • Emphasis on team building with global aspirations,
  • International expertise and intelligence in building a global presence,
  • Access to large Corporates and international clients.

For non-European companies willing to address the European market we provide:

  • Company setup,
  • Housing within our Luxembourg premises,
  • Local hiring,
  • Local Accounting, Payroll and tax filings,
  • IT integration with parent company,
  • Pan-European representative office setup,
  • Facilities Management Services,
  • Tailored services.
